SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminViewFacilityActivity
Activity that displays the details of a specific facility for the admin and allows the admin to delete the facility along with all associated events and notifications.
AdminViewUserActivity
Activity that displays the details of a specific user for the admin.
CancelledListManageActivity
Activity to manage the cancelled list of an event.
ChosenListManageActivity
Activity to manage the chosen list of an event.
Control
Singleton control class for managing users, facilities, events, and notifications in the Event Lottery System.
CreateEventDialogFragment
Previous UI approach to creating an event
CreateEventDialogFragment.CreateEventListener
 
EditEventDialogFragment
Fragment for editing an existing event.
EditEventDialogFragment.EditEventListener
Listener interface to notify when the event is edited.
EditFacilityFragment
A DialogFragment that allows users to edit facility details such as name and description.
EditFacilityFragment.OnFacilityUpdatedListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the facility is updated.
EditProfileFragment
A DialogFragment that allows users to edit their profile details such as name, email, and contact.
EditProfileFragment.OnProfileUpdatedListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the profile is updated.
Event
Represents an Event in the lottery system with details such as name, description, user lists, and geo-settings.
EventslistActivity
EventslistActivity displays a categorized list of events, including organized, waiting, canceled, chosen, final, and other events.
FacilitiesListActivity
Activity to display the list of facilities in the system.
Facility
Represents a facility in the event lottery system.
facilityActivity
An Activity that displays and allows editing of the user's facility information.
FinalListManageActivity
Activity to manage the final list of an event.
Landing_page
Represents the landing page of the event lottery system.
MainActivity
 
ManageEventActivity
ManageEventActivity is responsible for displaying and managing event details.
MapDialogFragment
A DialogFragment that displays a Google Map with markers representing event locations.
MyApplication
 
MyFirebaseMessagingService
 
Notification
 
NotificationActivity
An Activity that displays a list of notifications for the current user.
NotifyFragment
NotifyFragment is a dialog fragment that prompts the user to input a notification message.
NotifyFragment.NotificationListener
Listener interface for notifying when the user submits a message.
ProfileActivity
An Activity that displays the user's profile information and allows editing of the profile.
QRCodeDialogFragment
A DialogFragment that displays a QR code generated from an encoded hash string.
ScanQRActivity
An activity that initiates a QR code scan and handles the scanned results.
SettingActivity
SettingActivity manages user settings, allowing users to enable or disable notifications.
User
 
UserAdapter
 
UsersListActivity
 
ViewEventActivity
ViewEventActivity displays the details of a selected event and allows the user to join or cancel their participation.
ViewOtherUserProfileActivity
An Activity that displays the user's profile information and allows editing of the profile.
WaitingListManageActivity
Activity to manage the waiting list of an event.
